rComments: All the assignments and projects are graded by the professor. However, the grade depends on his subjective opinion too much. You cannot even know why you get such mark. When you know the mark, he has uploaded all of them. I found that he marked incorrectly more than once because he didn't notice my files incidentally.

Definitely not the best prof at giving a lecture, I feel like it's not necessary to attend his lecture, you will have to figure stuff out yourself. When he gives out an assignment, it is hard to understand what to do and what's important, what's not.

A nice person but a bad prof. Vague marking scheme and instruction, heavy workload. This course is very stressful and requires loads of efforts on it. Lectures are useless and the prof is too busy to reply all the emails which makes this course basically depend on self study. The prof will not give grades or feedback until the end of semester.
